features: FORWARD-LOOKING DESIGN: Nesugar G3 Travel Steamer for Clothes has a Forward-looking design. Mainbody is as light as only 0.75lbs, almost the weight of two Smart phones, long lasting for over 8 minutes of continuous steaming to emit wrinkle perfectly by using less steam, keeping clothes as dry as possible in the meantime.

EASE TO USE: 900W Steamer produces soft and long-lasting dry steam. preparation for steaming in just 15 seconds, with only one button to control for steaming. 6ft Power Cord, easy for operating steamer conveniently. Equipped a travel storage bag, it can be a portable travel steamer or a handyhome steamer.
STEAMING IN ANY ORIENTATION: As a portable steamer, it is designed to use in all angles. Dual-use is designed with a hanging iron and a flat iron for home and travel uses.
NO WATER SPOT LEFT BEHIND: Nesugar G3 Travel Steamer from any angle without any water left behind! For all kind of garments, all coats, wool, delicates, and more.
WHAT YOU GET: 1* garment steamer, 1* flannel storage bag, 1* user manual, our worry-free 365 days warranty, and friendly customer service

about nesugar Nesugar is an original design brand, industrial design as the driving force of innovation, to create innovative life aesthetic products. Interesting, innovation, simplicity as the brand design concept; interesting: change the coldness of the previous products, increase the fun; innovation: different design, give users a new experience; simplicity: without excessive decoration, back to the essence of design. The young and energetic design team is committed to exploring products with new experience methods and giving users a new experience; we may make mistakes in the process of innovation, but we will continue to try, until the product experience exceeds user expectations, our innovation will never stop. Our mission is to design products that provide users with a new experience that exceeds expectations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Travel. Wish Water Reservoir was a Bit Bigger!
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Nesugar G3 Steamer for my travels. It exceeded my expectations. It is incredibly lightweight and compact, making it perfect for packing in my suitcase. The steamer heats up quickly, allowing me to quickly remove wrinkles from my clothes without any hassle.The steaming time is decent for its size, providing solid minutes of continuous work. I appreciate that it doesn't leave my clothes damp or with water spots, which is a common issue with some steamers. The flexibility of using it in any orientation was also a plus, as I could easily steam clothes whether they were laid flat or hung up.My only minor complaint is that I wish the water reservoir could hold a bit more or that the steamer lasted a little longer. However, considering its compact size, this is a minor inconvenience.Overall, the Nesugar G3 Steamer is a fantastic travel companion. It does its job effectively, takes up minimal space in my luggage, and is incredibly easy to use. I highly recommend it for anyone looking for a reliable and convenient steamer for their travels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for travel and at home
reviews.reviewText: Alright, so here's the deal with the Nesugar G3 Travel Steamer:Honestly, it's light. Like, really light. Just picture carrying two smartphones and that’s pretty much the weight of this steamer. Super simple and not a hassle to throw in your bag when you're off for a trip.The steaming time is surprisingly decent for its size. It gives solid minutes of continuous work, and it somehow manages to keep things pretty dry in the process. It’s not shooting out massive clouds of steam, but it’s enough to get the wrinkles out without soaking your clothes, which is a plus in my book.Now, when it comes to using it, it's honestly a piece of cake. It heats up very quick. You've got just one button to worry about, so there’s no fumbling around trying to figure out different settings. Plus, a 6ft power cord comes in handy so you're not tied to the wall socket.The flexibility of using it in any orientation was genuinely useful. Whether I needed to lay something flat or hang it up, the steamer was cooperative in both scenarios. Kind of a dual-use scenario which is really thought through, considering we don’t always have the luxury of an ironing board while traveling.Water spots can be annoying, but didn’t notice any with the G3. It seemed to handle all kinds of fabrics well and didn’t leave them damp or with those annoying spots that some steamers can.So, if you’re someone who likes to keep things crisp while you're on the move, and you're not looking for anything overly complex or bulky, the Nesugar G3 might just be a worthwhile companion. It does its job, doesn’t ask for much space, and it’s pretty foolproof to use. Not too shabby at all!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Travels well and heats up quickly
reviews.reviewText: I bought the steamer to take with me on a cruise as they normally don’t allow heating devices and it was allowed due to its compactness, but also, worked wonderfully!Reminder, it truly is not a huge steamer, so you may find yourself filling it in often, but it gets the job done when traveling and takes little space. Lastly, the hardware is quite sturdy and does not feel as if it would break easily.Worth the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Compact and easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This is one of the greatest steamers I’ve ever bought for travel. It warms up really quick and it has a sleek design. I will for sure take this to all of my travels. It definitely made my clothes look so much cleaner and wrinkle free and it was very lightweight and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Small but mighty
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to travel with, and it works so well!!! Fits in my luggage really easily, and the reservoir is small, but it goes a LONG way. I was able to steam an entire wedding dress with 1 full tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Travel Tool
reviews.reviewText: Since purchasing, I've used the Nesugar G3 Portable Steamer for Clothes during international travel, on a cruise and for light steaming. I absolutely love it. It's so easy to use, and it does a great job of removing wrinkles from all types of fabrics. It’s has a very nice design and a compact size which is great for traveling. The quality is good and light weight. I’m very pleased with my purchase. I’ve recommended it to my family and friends.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The heat up time is really short and is ready to be used fast after plugging in. It steams perfectly and is easy to use. The steamer actually lasts a decently long time off of a full tank and is a good size for packing away. The build quality is pretty good too and lets you use it either horizontally or vertically.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Powerful Little Steamer
reviews.reviewText: I specifically bought this to get rid of the wrinkles on my curtains. It works wonderfully. I love how easy it is to use. It's light so it's great for travel. I'm happy with my purchase.
